ygData.subject: FS Plate Pricing questions (I have alot of them)
ygData.msgSnippet: I am on the Fennin server, so smiths from my server please let me know what the trend is for our home. I do not want to cause waves, get ripped, or over
ygData.messageBody:
I am on the Fennin server, so smiths from my server please let me know what
the trend is for our home. I do not want to cause waves, get ripped, or over
charge. =)

Is it safe to charge double or tripple the cost of 1 attempt to make for
each item you can make?
ie.
1 MQ sheet = 21p with high Cha.
Bracer Mold = 7p (I think, can't remember exactly)
* Padding not worth adding in as a cost
So sale price = 60p or 90p (or more?)

Or does FS Plate sell by the AC?
ie.
10 plat per AC point

How does being Dyed effect this price?

When selling a "Full Set" of dyed FS Plate, is this only the visual pieces,
or dyed visual pieces and un-dyed non-visual pieces?

Does the color effect sale price? If so, how?
ie
black (6k visual only) > red (5.5k visual only) > blue (5k visual only) >
yellow (3.5k Visual only)... or all colors reguardless are 4-6k depending on
server...

Resin is roughly 6 plat per, so Resin 3 (neon from what I have seen) is the
most expensive... how do most of you add this in to the price?
ie.
Add 20p(resin 1), 40p (resin 2), 60p(resin 3)for each piece?

Does Size effect price?
ie.
I had to go to Halas/Grobb to get the molds, so is more... (?)

A "full set" of non-dyed (all pieces) sells for how much?
Assuming no failures on ore conversion, and making ore into folded sheets,
base cost of ore for making 1 of each piece is 511 plat.
BP mold is 22 plat, Bracer Mold is around 7 plat, everything else is in
between. Average 14p per mold and you get 182 plat for molds.
Total: 693 plat to make 1 complete suit of FSp Plate. Round to 700 to make
the math simple...
With the above sale suggestion, sale price: 1400 or 2100 plat. This even
close on most servers?

And finally, what type of demand is there for FS Plate?



I got into Smithing mainly because I wanted to be able to twink my SK with
blood red FS plate, and to be able to make things my guild needed. To get to
173 in smithing, I spent less plat than I believe it would have cost me to
buy what I made, and I made a set for my wife's cleric to. So I know in the
end, I saved alot of plat. Plus, later if i want a new color, I can do it
relatively easy. ;-)

Thanks for all your help, and for reading this far.

--
Arakine Uktena *Changing Tide*
Fennin Ro
